name: Deezer - Dark Theme
additional_info:
version 0.2.5 (September 8, 2017) fixes:
  • removed white backgrounds from search result page
version 0.2.4 (Aug 21, 2017) fixes:
  • a few tweaks for the login/register page
  • New styles for the account settings page
  • The adblock banner is now also dark
  • New tooltip background color
  • and a few more minor adjustments
version 0.2.3 (Aug 11, 2017) fixes:
  • restore border-radius settings
  • changed font-color to a lighter look and feel
version 0.2.2 (Aug 09, 2017) fixes:
  • white backgrounds/borders removed from grid elements
version 0.2.1 (Jan 06, 2016) fixes:
  • white backgrounds/borders removed from advert containers
  • adverts are now dimmed
version 0.2 (Jan 05, 2016) fixes:
  • white backgrounds/borders removed on different pages
version 0.1 (Nov 15, 2015)
  • First Release

discussions.name: Font is a bit too dark imo
Love this theme! Is there a way to make player fullscreen?
@Mac Rebant and the full screen question
